fields.label: Event Metadata
fields.name: event_metadata
fields.instructions: Information which is shown underneath the name of the Event; metadata about the movie itself

fields.label: Event Details
fields.name: event_details
fields.instructions: Displayed in the sidebar, underneath the detail support box
fields.default_value:
• General Admission - $11.00
• Student / Senior - $9.50
• Members - $7.50

General Admission, Student / Senior & Members tickets are available online AND at the door.

ALL FILMS START EXACTLY AT THE LISTED TIME, AND ALL TICKET SALES ARE FINAL. NO REFUNDS, NO EXCHANGES, NO EXCEPTIONS.

fields.label: Event Sponsor
fields.name: event_sponsor
fields.instructions: Shows up under the "Under the Support Of" module in the sidebar, after Event Details.

fields.label: Event Reviews
fields.name: event_reviews
fields.instructions: Mostly referring for quotes from movies. For full effect, make sure the quotes are in the BLOCKQUOTE tags and the sources are in the SMALL tags in HTML. (Please see Ernie if that makes no sense.)

fields.label: Slideshow
fields.name: event_slideshow
fields.instructions: Upload any high-resolution photos here and it will now be shown in a gallery.

fields.label: Event Video Trailer
fields.name: trailer
fields.instructions: Insert the URL of the embedded video URL, from YouTube or Vimeo

fields.label: Event Ticket URL
fields.name: ticketurl
fields.instructions: The URL of the place to purchase the ticket (such as on EventBrite or BrownPaperTickets) or a place where people can purchase or reserve their tickets (such as on tugg)

fields.label: Override "one night only" prefix
fields.name: override_desc
fields.instructions: If this event only has one performance, it will say "ONE NIGHT ONLY: " unless you override the field. This will appear on both the homepage and spoken by a robot if someone calls into a theater.
